DOC.brief_summary: Tart cherry rich source antioxidant . Studies show tart cherry exert anti-oxidative anti-inflammatory property . The purpose study learn effect drink tart cherry juice cardiovascular cognitive health .
DOC.detailed_description: Thirty-seven older adult randomly assign drink 16 oz per day either tart cherry juice placebo drink 12 week . Blood urine sample collect baseline 12 week assess biomarkers . Physical activity 3-day diet record also collect throughout study .
